author: chfast
content: This is a feature I really need: https://github.com/ethereum/tests/issues/998. Would be nice to get any response.

author: lightclient
content: <@!425274498732916736> I think the issue with having this in `t8n` is that `output` is only a concept at the tx level while `t8n` operates at the block level

author: lightclient
content: We could possibly add it to the tx receipt though as an extra value?
